component.name: FFcuesplitter-gui
component.summary: A cross-platform GUI for the FFcuesplitter library written in wxPython Phoenix

description.p: FFcuesplitter-gui extracts audio tracks from an audio CD image supplied with the CUE sheet, using FFmpeg.

It features editable tags per track, checkboxes to select track extractions, an audio CD properties viewer, support for WAV, FLAC, MP3 and OGG output formats, audio compression selectors and the ability to copy audio codec without re-encoding.
